Detailed Description

A set of concentric spheres.

The EGS_cSpheres class implements the geometry methods for a set of concentric spheres which define a geometry with regions. As in the case of a set of cylinders , the region index within the innermost sphere is 0 with the region index increasing towards the last sphere in the set.

The additional keys needed to construct a set of spheres is 


library = egs_spheres
midpoint = Ox, Oy, Oz
radii = list of sphere radii in increasing order

Examples of the usage of sets of spheres can be found in the cones.geom, hemisphere.geom, mushroom.geom, rounded_ionchamber.geom and I6702.inp example geometry files.
